de.zilchinger.vatsimdataapi.parser
Class AVatsimParser

java.lang.Object
  de.zilchinger.vatsimdataapi.parser.AVatsimParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerParser, StatusParser, UserParser
public abstract class AVatsimParser
extends java.lang.Object

The Abstract Vatsim Parser is the generalization for each parser used to handle different data like controllers, pilots, servers etc.

Author:
Stefan Zilch - (06.08.2011)
